metadata.title: CVE-2021-30666 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A buffer overflow issue was addressed with improved memory handling. Thisissue is fixed in iOS 12.5.3. Processing maliciously crafted web contentmay lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that thisissue may have been actively exploited..

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-30666` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.26.1-3
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.26.1-3
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.26.1-3
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.26.1-3
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.26.1-3
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.26.1-3
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.26.1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.26.1-3').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
